original_text: But you, Timothy, are a servant of God. So keep away from all bad things like that. Instead, always try to do what is right. Serve God in a way that pleases him. Choose to trust God and to love other people. Continue to be strong when you have trouble. Be kind to people.
korean_text: 오직 너 하나님의 사람아 이것들을 피하고 의와 경건과 믿음과 사랑과 인내와 온유를 따르며

sentences.original_text: But you, Timothy, are a servant of God.
So keep away from all bad things like that.
sentences.korean_translation: 그러므로 그런 모든 나쁜 것들을 피하라.

sentences.original_text: Instead, always try to do what is right.
sentences.korean_translation: 대신에 항상 옳은 일을 하려고 노력하라.

sentences.original_text: Serve God in a way that pleases him.
Choose to trust God and to love other people.
Continue to be strong when you have trouble.
sentences.korean_translation: 어려움을 당할 때 강하게 굳건히 하라.
